activities.name: Installation of temporary rock causeways
activities.description: Temporary rock causeways with a combined footprint of 779 m² below the high water mark of the Grand River for a duration of approximately 6 months during year one of construction.

activities.name: Installation of temporary rock causeways
activities.description: Temporary rock causeways with a combined footprint of 1057 m² below the high water mark of the Grand River for a duration of approximately 6 months during year two of construction.

activities.name: Installation of temporary rock causeways
activities.description: Temporary rock causeways with a combined footprint of 227 m² below the high water mark of the Grand River for a duration of approximately 6 months during year three of construction.

activities.name: Installation of new bridge piers
activities.description: Two new bridge piers with a combined footprint of 677 m² below the high water mark of the Grand River.
